item.title: ChromeOS does not a monopoly make.
item.description: Chill out people. ChromeOS might be interesting and all, but it's not going to be killing any operating systems in the near future. Chrome has enough of a challenge keeping up with the other browsers, not to mention being able to replace modern desktop operating systems. As usual, Ted Dzuiba has dissected this situation with much more wit than I could muster: Keep whacking away on that Pareto Principle and let us all know how it turns out.
